title: 02/10/21 DPS Hour 3 Doc Rivers
itunes:title: 02/10/21 DPS Hour 3 Doc Rivers
description:
Doc Rivers tells Dan that he is a life long Bears fan and that he hopes they land Deshaun Watson and win the Super Bowl. Doc says he loves his team because they are young and gifted.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
